content: अवच्छेदक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Separating. {@--2@} Determining, deciding, प्रतियोगिकावच्छेदकावच्छिन्नं {@--3@} Bounding, limiting. {@--4@} Pervading. {@--5@} Distinguishing, particularizing. {@--6@} Peculiar, characteristic. --कः {@--1@} That which distinguishes. {@--2@} A predicate, characteristic property. {@--3@} Boundary, limit.
